channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Unica Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Unica Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-37498|2024-10-17T15:43:19.004Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica%20platform
item.description: A user is capable of assigning him/herself to arbitrary groups by reusing a POST request issued by an administrator. Â It is possible that an attacker could potentially escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-37497|2024-10-17T15:00:50.717Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica%20platform
item.description: The Unica application exposes an API which accepts arbitrary XML input. By manipulating the given XML, an authenticated attacker with certain rights can successfully perform XML External Entity attacks (XXE) against the backend service.
